Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers have won each of their last 8 games as road favorites against the Guardians.
The Guardians have lost 5 of their last 6 night playoff games after not playing the previous day.
The Tigers have covered the run line in each of their last 10 games against the Guardians at Progressive Field following a loss.
The Guardians have failed to cover the run line in each of their last 9 games against the Tigers at Progressive Field following a win.
Detroit Tigers vs Cleveland Guardians Pr: Give me Skubal with the season on the line. The Tigers wouldn’t rather have it any other way. Skubal has been dominant so far this season, and he’s going to dominate again here. He hasn’t given up a run yet in the playoffs, and I don’t think he will either against the Guardians offense. The Tigers are only going to need a couple of runs to get the job done, and they will get the job done. Back the Tigers on the money line.
